name: Floppy Turd
description:
Inspired by Flappy Crappy and the Super Mario Bros  saga, Floppy Turd is a great Endless runner game that has lots of fun content to explore. Special moves and challenges included.
The game includes some great crap humor and contains mild language. 

  • Manure-ver through pipes that progressively become more challenging every 10 points
  • Explore the hidden sewer levels
  • Battle against Mario for your freedom
  • Collect special items and enjoy my amazing sense of humour

Future developments:

  • Storyline progression with Boss levels
  • Achievement system
  • More challenges 
  • Shop and upgrades
  • Possible online high score system

Currently the game is still a work in progress. If you do not feel I deserve any donations feel free to download the game without donating and please return with feedback :D

Know anyone who does let's plays? Please refer my games :)

Updates at: https://www.facebook.com/Gr8BitGames/
